features.feature_description: Feature that creates a carousel object typically with a set of cards.

facts.name: Autoplay
facts.detail: Carousel object is supported in the channel

facts.name: Minimum Buttons per Card
facts.detail: Every card can be displayed with no buttons.

facts.name: Maximum Buttons per Card
facts.detail: Every card can max display 20 buttons.

facts.name: Minimum Images per Card
facts.detail: Every card can be displayed with no images.

facts.name: Maximum Images per Card
facts.detail: Every card can max display 1 image.

facts.name: Subtitle
facts.detail: Every card can display a subtitle text.

facts.detail: Only buttons on the last carousel card will be displayed.

facts.name: Minimum Images per Card
facts.detail: Every card can be displayed with no images.

facts.detail: Every card can max display 1 image.

facts.name: Subtitle
facts.detail: Every card can display a subtitle text.
